txt.en: Orcs mounted on Wargs patrol the farmlands surrounding Marton, creating a moving wall around the town.
Defeat mounted Orcs in the farmlands of Marton ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Mounted Orcs can be found patrolling Marton's farmlands in the Westfold.\n\nYou should defeat mounted Orcs in the Westfold.
